meanings.definition: Sannyasis: plural noun, individuals who have renounced worldly life and possessions in pursuit of spiritual enlightenment.
meanings.sent1: The sannyasis lived in a peaceful ashram, away from the hustle and bustle of the city.
meanings.sent2: Many sannyasis travel from place to place, spreading their message of peace and love.
meanings.sent3: The sannyasis decided to have a picnic in the park, enjoying nature's beauty.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a sanctuary, where thoughts of sannyasis seeking enlightenment roamed freely.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sannyasis meditating under the ancient tree was etched in his memory.
